notification.name: {~00AAFF}Example of notifications}
notification.text:
Mod authors can now place notifications for the game directly in the main menu. Notifications from active mods will be displayed right here.

A hidden notification will not be shown again unless its text changes.

You can always view the list of all available notifications from active mods by clicking the "{Notifications}" button at the top of the screen.

Mod authors can add a link to files either in the game folder or on the Internet. You can see an example of a completed file by clicking on the title of this notification.

notification.name: {~00AAFF}Heroes Launcher}
notification.text:
{~text align=left}Use "{Heroes Launcher}" for automatic Assembly updates.
You can also install mods via the built-in "{Mods Browser}"!

{Download}: click the notification title to open the page in your browser and download the latest version of "{Heroes Launcher}".

user.no_dat_settings:
{Attention, Player!}

The game did not detect the saved WoG-options settings specified in the WoG.ini file! This means that the "default" settings from the "zsetup01.txt" file will be applied.
To save your settings, open the WoG-options menu and click on the "Save" button.

If you click "Cancel", this message will no longer be shown.
